# [Interview #1126: Barnes & Noble (Newnan), Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1126#8)

#### Question

If you had the choice of being an Epic and being evil or not, would you take that choice--

#### Brandon Sanderson

Would I make the choice to become an Epic? Well they /ALL GO EVIL/ so //NO//. No no no no. Iâ€™d be a Mistborn, yes yes yes yes yes. \*laughter\* Epic? no no no no.
